author: Papa Keith
title: Kanye West Receives Praise for Defending Bianca Censori After SA Incident | Real 106.1 | Papa Keith
text: Last night, reports emerged that Kanye West was a suspect in an alleged assault that occurred on Wednesday evening in Los Angeles. This was a significant story, with fans uncertain about its implications. Allegedly, Bianca Censori was grabbed, leading to the accusations against Ye. However, Yeezy Chief of Staff Milo Yiannopoulos countered these claims, stating that the incident was different from initial reports. According to him, Censori was sexually assaulted when a man attempted to grab under her dress and blew kisses at her. Milo emphasized that the description of "A stranger grabbed Bianca" was insufficient, as she was physically assaulted. He detailed the assailant's actions, including grabbing her waist, spinning her around, and blowing kisses, resulting in her being battered and sexually assaulted. The allegations were deeply troubling, and our thoughts are with Censori during this time. Social media users expressed shock and promptly shared their reactions. Many supported Ye's alleged response, emphasizing zero tolerance for sexual assault. Further updates are expected, and we will provide new information as it unfolds. Share your thoughts on this matter in the comments below. Do you believe Kanye's coverage was unjust? What are your thoughts on the investigation's progress and potential outcomes? Keep it locked to 103.5 The Beat for more!

author: roberto-espinoza-mogro
title: El ‚ÄòCholo‚Äô Sotil, exjugador del FC Barcelona, fue internado de urgencia en un hospital de Lima
text:
El exfutbolista peruano Hugo Cholo Sotil, jugador del FC Barcelona en los a√±os setenta -en una √©poca en la que coincidi√≥ con el astro holand√©s Johan Cruyff-, ha sido internado en la unidad de cuidados intensivos (UCI) de un hospital de Lima tras sufrir un problema de salud durante la madrugada de este jueves, informaron fuentes oficiales.
Sotil, de 75 a√±os, fue ingresado en el servicio de emergencia del Hospital Dos de Mayo, donde recibi√≥ ‚Äúatenci√≥n especializada inmediata‚Äù y actualmente est√° ‚Äúmonitoreado constantemente‚Äù en cuidados intensivos, se√±al√≥ el Ministerio de Salud (Minsa) en un comunicado.
El Minsa a√±adi√≥ que ‚Äúpor pedido expreso de la familia‚Äù del exinternacional peruano ‚Äúno se brindar√° mayores detalles sobre su estado de salud‚Äù, por lo que pidi√≥ a los medios de comunicaci√≥n y a la ciudadan√≠a ‚Äúrespetar esta decisi√≥n, as√≠ como la privacidad del paciente y su entorno cercano‚Äù.
Publicidad
‚ÄúEl Hospital Dos de Mayo garantiza la atenci√≥n m√©dica especializada que requiere el Sr. Hugo Sotil‚Äù, concluy√≥.
El exdelantero, quien anot√≥ el gol del 1-0 que le dio a Per√∫ el t√≠tulo de la Copa Am√©rica de 1975 frente a Colombia, particip√≥ el pasado 29 de noviembre en la gala celebrada en el Gran Teatro del Liceo de Barcelona por el 125 aniversario de la entidad azulgrana.
Sotil conform√≥ junto con el holand√©s Johan Cruyff una de las delanteras m√°s recordadas del Barcelona, que en la temporada 1973-1974 logr√≥ una goleada por 0-5 frente al Real Madrid en el estadio Bernabeu.
Publicidad
Durante su reciente visita a Barcelona, el exjugador se declar√≥ feliz de haber regresado ‚Äúa casa‚Äù y dijo que el nuevo estadio del club catal√°n ‚Äúes hermoso‚Äù. (D)

author: Glenn Gillet
title: Cyclone √† Mayotte: l'archipel plac√© en alerte rouge √† partir de ce vendredi soir
text:
Mayotte a √©t√© plac√©e en alerte rouge cyclonique √† partir de ce vendredi, 22 heures locales. Le pr√©fet √©voque un "√©v√©nement in√©dit" et "d'une extr√™me violence". Le d√©partement de Mayotte va √™tre plac√© en alerte rouge cyclonique √† partir de ce vendredi 13 d√©cembre √† 22 heures (20 heures, heure de Paris), a annonc√© le pr√©fet. Toute circulation sur la voie publique sera interdite √† partir de 22 heures et l'a√©roport de Dzaoudzi sera ferm√© √† partir de 20 heures, a-t-il pr√©cis√©.
"C'est un √©v√©nement in√©dit (...) d'une extr√™me violence, les vents pourront d√©passer 180 km/h", a expliqu√© Fran√ßois-Xavier Bieuville lors d'une conf√©rence de presse. Le pr√©fet a appel√© les personnes log√©es dans des habitations pr√©caires, tr√®s nombreuses dans le d√©partement le plus pauvre de France, √† se confiner dans les 71 centres d'h√©bergement ouverts par les autorit√©s, situ√©s dans les √©tablissements scolaires et gymnases et qui "seront ouverts √† tous", a-t-il indiqu√©".
M√©t√©o-France √©voque des rafales allant jusqu'√† 200 km/h L'archipel √©tait plac√© en alerte orange depuis ce vendredi matin en lien avec l'arriv√©e du cyclone Chido, qui circulera √† proximit√© de l'√Æle √† partir de la nuit de vendredi √† samedi et dans la journ√©e de samedi.
√Ä ce stade, ce "cyclone tropical intense" est √† "environ 500 kilom√®tres de Mayotte et circule au nord de Madagascar", a indiqu√© une repr√©sentante de M√©t√©o-France lors de la conf√©rence de presse. Des rafales √† "150-200 km/h (sont) possibles √† proximit√© imm√©diate du centre du cyclone notamment sur la partie nord de l'√Æle", et d'importants cumuls de pluie allant jusqu'√† 150mm de pluie sont √©galement attendus, avait pr√©cis√© l'agence m√©t√©orologique dans son dernier bulletin publi√© ce matin.
Ces conditions m√©t√©orologiques fortement d√©grad√©es entra√Ænent "un risque de ruissellement et d'inondation, et une houle marine qui peut avoir des effets importants sur le littoral" a ajout√© Fran√ßois-Xavier Bieuville, qui a enjoint les bateaux √† "imp√©rativement rejoindre la terre ferme". La derni√®re barge, qui relie Dzaoudzi √† Mamoudzou, partira √† 17h30.
Un cyclone plus intense que celui historique de 1984 En cons√©quence du passage en alerte orange, la pr√©fecture avait annonc√© la fermeture des √©coles de l'archipel pour les journ√©es de vendredi et samedi.
Dans un communiqu√© publi√© jeudi et relay√© par Le Monde , le minist√®re de l'Int√©rieur a annonc√© l'envoi de 110 professionnels de la s√©curit√© civile, dont 71 sapeurs-sauveteurs de la s√©curit√© civile et 39 sapeurs-pompiers du service d√©partemental d‚Äôincendie et de secours (SDIS) de La R√©union, en renfort des forces pr√©sente √† Mayotte.
Le d√©partement fran√ßais est relativement √©pargn√©e par les cyclones, le dernier significatif remontant √† d√©cembre 2019 avec le passage de Belna . Environ 15.000 habitants avaient √©t√© pr√©ventivement log√©s dans des centres d'h√©bergement mais le cyclone n'avait pas fait de d√©g√¢t majeur.
Nombre de Mahorais gardent toutefois le souvenir de Kamisy, en avril 1984, une √©poque o√π l'habitat √©tait majoritairement b√¢ti en mati√®re v√©g√©tale. Il y avait eu un mort et d'importants d√©g√¢ts mat√©riels. Le cyclone Chido est "plus fort" que Kamirsy, a assur√© le pr√©fet lors de sa conf√©rence de presse.
Glenn Gillet avec AFP Les plus lus
"Il faut se pr√©parer": Mayotte bascule en vigilance orange √† l'approche d'un nouveau cyclone

author: A.J. Nwoko
title: Why these Virginians plan to vote early
text: HANOVER COUNTY, Va. -- Election Day is just over six weeks away, but Virginians won‚Äôt have to wait until Nov. 5 to make their decisions about the representation they want to see at the local, state and national level. On Friday, the polls will open for the first time for early voting across the Commonwealth. Some Virginians already plan to vote early. ‚ÄúI love early voting," said Louise Phelix. "I love it because I can take time to consider who I want to vote for. I don‚Äôt have to wait in line." ‚ÄúI will be early voting because I will be on my honeymoon on Election Day and so I won‚Äôt be in the country at the time,‚Äú said Chris Edwards. ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt really thinking about it much, but hearing that‚Äôs its going on tomorrow, its probably something that I‚Äôll probably look into doing a lot sooner,‚Äù said Jadin Whitaker. Hanover voter registrar outreach liaison Caryn Fuerte said that with this year being a presidential election cycle, the county office is expecting a huge turnout. But she believes they‚Äôre prepared for the surge of early ballot casters. "The eagerness to come out and vote has been amazing,‚Äù Fuerte said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got lots of phone calls lots of people coming in. I love that our citizens are so engaged.‚Äù Fuerte said voters can help move the early voting process along quickly by having photo IDs ready to go. The presidential race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump is sure to be top of mind for most Virginians going to the polls early. At the state level, Democratic Sen. Tim Kane is seeking another term as he faces off against Republican Challenger Hung Cao ‚Äî alongside the 11 congressional races happening across the Commonwealth. Fuerte said where ever and whenever you happen to be voting this year, now is the time to start double checking registration and figuring out where you can vote. Voters can check their registration at vote.virginia.gov. By the time polls open Friday, constituents who plan on casting their vote ahead of Election Day should be able to find a sample ballot at their voting location or online at their registrar's website. Polls will be open five days a week, Monday through Friday from 9am to 5pm. Early voting on Saturday won‚Äôt become available until the two Saturdays before Election Day, Oct. 26 and Nov. 2. EAT IT, VIRGINIA restaurant news and interviews

author: Alexander Moraski
title: Rouses Market Opens in Picayune, Adding Jobs and Expanding Services
text:
A new Rouses Market opened in Picayune yesterday, introducing a 40,000-square-foot supermarket at 1701 Highway 43 North in the River Ridge Shopping Center. This location is the fourth Rouses store in Mississippi, with a fifth planned for Biloxi in October.
Rouses Markets purchased the River Ridge Shopping Center in 2022, bringing the store closer to Picayune and Pearl River County residents who previously traveled to Slidell for shopping. CEO Donny Rouse explained the decision to open the store.
‚ÄúWe receive customer requests to build in their neighborhoods, but we can only open a few stores yearly. Our customers in Picayune and Pearl River County have been shopping with us in Slidell, so we wanted to offer a closer option,‚Äù Rouse said.
The store will employ up to 150 people, offering full‚Äîand part-time positions. Departments include a full-service seafood section, butcher shop with in-house steak aging, bakery, deli, hot food options, sushi, poke bowls, and a Mongolian grill. The store also offers online shopping and curbside pickup.
Rouse acknowledged the role of local government in the store‚Äôs development and thanked Picayune Mayor Jim Luke for his involvement.
‚ÄúI want to thank Mayor Jim Luke for his support throughout the process,‚Äù Rouse said.
Mayor Luke commented on the economic impact of the new store.
‚ÄúThis new store provides 150 jobs and adds to our local economy. It also offers a new grocery option for our residents,‚Äù said Luke.
Councilwoman Ana Turnage, who represents the district where the store is located, noted the potential economic benefits.
‚ÄúHiring this many people may encourage them to shop locally and possibly settle in Picayune, further boosting the community. It‚Äôs also an additional shopping option for our citizens,‚Äù said Turnage.

author: Umer Jamshaid
title: Motorway M14 Closed Due To Dense Fog - UrduPoint
text:
ISLAMABAD, (UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 29th Dec, 2023) The National Highways and Motorway Police (NHMP) on Friday temporarily sealed off the M14 motorway stretching from the Indus River to Yarik due to dense fog.

The Motorway Police, taking proactive measures, aimed to avert potential accidents and safeguard the lives and belongings of motorway users, a public relations officer said while talking to APP.

As the mist engulfs the thoroughfare, citizens are urged to exercise caution and limit unnecessary travel during foggy hours and a comprehensive guide issued by the Motorway Police to help navigate through the blanket of fog safely.

To mitigate risks during this weather phenomenon, the Motorway Police advises citizens to conclude their journeys before the fog descends and daylight fades. This precautionary measure is pivotal in ensuring visibility on the road, reducing the likelihood of mishaps, he added.

One of the key recommendations from the Motorway Police is the use of fog lights in vehicles. These specialized lights are designed to cut through the mist, providing enhanced visibility for drivers and minimizing the chances of collisions. Implementing this simple yet effective measure can make a significant difference in navigating through the fog-laden motorway.

Drivers are reminded to avoid speeding and maintain a reasonable distance from the vehicle ahead. The reduced visibility demands a cautious approach, and adhering to speed limits can be the differentiator between a safe journey and a potential accident. Keeping a safe distance ensures adequate reaction time, allowing drivers to respond to unexpected situations promptly.

NHMP authorities said that for real-time updates and information, the Motorway Police Helpline (130) is readily available for commuters. Before embarking on a journey, it's advisable to seek the latest updates on road conditions, closures, and visibility from this helpline. Additionally, citizens can stay connected through the official social media accounts of the National Highways and Motorway Police for instant updates on the evolving situation.

As the M14 motorway grapples with a veil of fog, the Motorway Police encourage responsible driving practices and urge citizens to prioritize safety. By adhering to these guidelines and staying informed through official channels, commuters can navigate through the misty challenges, ensuring a secure and uneventful journey on the motorway.

author: Indiablooms
title: American Airlines flight makes 'insane landing' at London Airport amid Storm Gerrit | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management
text: American Airlines flight makes 'insane landing' at London Airport amid Storm Gerrit An American Airlines flight struggled and experienced a bumpy landing at the Heathrow Airport in London amid strong winds caused due to Storm Gerrit on Wednesday. A video of the landing was shared on X by BigJetTV where the wings of the Boeing 777 were seen tilting and its wings angling towards the ground on the runway. Big Jet TV posted on X: "American 777 insane landing at London Heathrow! Caught during our livestream at @HeathrowAirport. Strong, gusting crosswind elements catching-out even the most seasoned pilots! Wouldn‚Äôt have liked being the NFP on this one watch the flight surfaces." American 777 insane landing at London Heathrow!‚Äî BIG JET TV (@BigJetTVLIVE) Caught during our livestream at [@HeathrowAirport]. Strong, gusting crosswind elements catching-out even the most seasoned pilots! Wouldn‚Äôt have liked being the NFP on this one üòÇ watch the flight surfaces Get involved: what‚Äôs‚Ä¶ [pic.twitter.com/PjfqhsQjX2] [December 27, 2023] Several flights were cancelled and air traffic saw major delays at Heathrow amid strong winds caused due to the storm. UK's flag carrier British Airways reportedly cancelled 13 flights due to inclement weather. In Ireland, Dublin Airport remained unscathed, though Cork saw four diversions, to Dublin and Shannon, reported CNN. UK Met Office on Wednesday (December 27, 2023) predicted Storm Gerrit would bring strong winds and heavy rain to many parts of the UK on Wednesday, with wintry hazards also likely, especially across northern Scotland. Met Office Chief Meteorologist Frank Saunders had said: ‚ÄúStorm Gerrit will run towards western UK on Wednesday and bring with it potential impacts for much of the UK." ‚ÄúWinds across southern coastal areas of England will be strong, possibly peaking around 70 mph on exposed coastlines, but more widely around 50-60 mph within the warning area," Saundaers said.
